name: Sup--
description:
New experiments with texture and motion over one of my original drawings.

In this collection I explore various ways of creating appealing color schemes and interesting loops over my drawings. This technique consist of a lot of random (happy) accident that guide me through the creation process.

Drawing done with procreate.
Painted and animated in Photoshop.

Artwork by Virgil Loth
https://twitter.com/virgill_artz
